DOC.brief_summary: This study is a multicenter, 9 months, open label extension study for all patients who are willing and eligible to continue from the pivotal, double-blind S308.3.002 study.
DOC.brief_title: An Open Label SLV308 Safety Extension to Study S308.3.002 in Patients With Parkinson's Disease Experiencing Motor Fluctuations.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients who have completed S308.3.002 trial Exclusion Criteria Patients with medically relevant abnormal findings (ECG, physical examination, Aes) at end of the maintenance phase (visit M6, week 24) of study S308.3.002
